# The `ModuleMemProfilerPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Public interface to the memory profiler module pass for instrumenting code to profile memory allocations and accesses. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Public interface to the memory profiler module pass for instrumenting code to profile memory allocations and accesses.
